translations: n.大成功；喝彩；辉煌的成就

phrs.translation: 辉煌的成就, 喝采, 辉煌, 台北怡亨

sentences.sentence: He is a diplomat of great eclat.
sentences.translation: 他是个声望显赫的外交家。

sentences.sentence: Her latest novel was received with great eclat.
sentences.translation: 她最新的小说备受赞赏。

sentences.sentence: Get eclat team, Get your dream, Get your future!
sentences.translation: 成为荣耀的团队，实现你的梦想，成就你的未来！
